__e: When you're married to a powerful man you damn well better make him feel powerful.
I once thought I could play a powerful man, and I lived to regret it.
Unfortunately, you've made an enemy of a very powerful man.

The message of the gospel has us standing in the way of a lot of things that powerful people want, and our resistance to change that message because it's not ours to change has made us a lot of enemies.
You are the son of... a man of great power and wealth...
He doesn't know any VIPs and they don't know him.
